query:
SELECT 'utm_links' as table_name, COUNT(*) as count FROM utm_links WHERE LOWER(destination_url) LIKE '%test%' OR LOWER(utm_source) LIKE '%test%' OR LOWER(utm_campaign) LIKE '%test%' OR LOWER(angle_marketing) LIKE '%test%' OR LOWER(hook) LIKE '%test%'
UNION ALL
SELECT 'socials', COUNT(*) FROM socials WHERE LOWER(nom) LIKE '%test%'
UNION ALL
SELECT 'content_types', COUNT(*) FROM content_types WHERE LOWER(nom) LIKE '%test%'
UNION ALL
SELECT 'objectives', COUNT(*) FROM objectives WHERE LOWER(nom) LIKE '%test%'
UNION ALL
SELECT 'audiences', COUNT(*) FROM audiences WHERE LOWER(nom) LIKE '%test%'
UNION ALL
SELECT 'channels', COUNT(*) FROM channels WHERE LOWER(nom) LIKE '%test%';
